strength_description: Highest equity (~65-70% vs. random); premium pairs with nut flush/straight redraws, double-suited for max potential. Dominate preflop, rarely dominated.
ranges: AA[K-T][K-T]ds, AA[J-9][J-9]ds, KK[Q-T][Q-T]ds; focus on ds with 0g/1g connectivity.
concrete_examples: A♠A♥K♠K♥ (AAKKds - best overall, set + nut flush + broadway), A♠A♥J♠T♥ (AAJTds - set + wheel/broadway straight + flushes), A♠A♥Q♠Q♥ (AAQQds - double pairs + flush).
play_narrative: Always raise/3-bet/4-bet from any position; get stacks in preflop if possible vs. loose calls. Postflop: Value-bet aggressively with nuts/redraws; avoid overplaying without position. These win big pots multi-way due to equity edge.

strength_description: Strong equity (~60-65% vs. random); high pairs or connected broadways ds, good for nut draws/sets. Playable everywhere but tighten OOP.
ranges: AA[8-6][8-6]ds, KK[J-9][J-9]ds, QQ[K-T][K-T]ds, 0g broadway ds (e.g., KQJTds).
concrete_examples: K♠K♥Q♠Q♥ (KKQQds - double sets + flush), A♠A♥9♠9♥ (AA99ds - set over set potential + flush), K♠Q♥J♠T♥ (KQJTds - nut straight + flush draws).
play_narrative: Raise first in from HJ+; 3-bet vs. early opens. OOP, call/3-bet selectively. Postflop: Push edges with wraps/flush draws; fold if missing nuts. Ideal for building pots in position.

strength_description: Solid equity (~55-60% vs. random); mid-high pairs ds/ss, 0g/1g rundowns ds, A-high ss with connectivity. Good multi-way but vulnerable to domination.
ranges: QQ[J-9][J-9]ds, JJ[T-8][T-8]ds, 0g mid rundowns ds (e.g., JT98ds), A[K-T]xx ss with 1g.
concrete_examples: Q♠Q♥J♠J♥ (QQJJds - sets + straight), J♠T♥9♠8♥ (JT98ds - wrap straight + flush), A♠K♥Q♠J♦ (AKQJss - broadway + nut flush draw).
play_narrative: Raise from CO/BTN; call/3-bet vs. late opens. Fold UTG if table aggressive. Postflop: Bet draws aggressively in position; check-fold weak hits OOP. Balance with bluffs for protection.

strength_description: Marginal equity (~50-55% vs. random); low-mid pairs ss, 1g/2g rundowns ss, suited Aces with gaps. Speculative; rely on position and implied odds.
ranges: TT[9-7][9-7]ss, 99-66 ds/ss, 1g mid rundowns ss (e.g., JT97ss), Other A ss with 2g.
concrete_examples: T♠T♥9♠8♥ (TT98ss - set + straight draw), 9♠8♥7♠6♦ (9876ss - rundown + flush), A♠T♥7♠6♦ (AT76ss - nut flush + weak wrap).
play_narrative: Limp/call from blinds or BTN vs. passive; raise only late if folded to you. Fold early positions. Postflop: Chase nut draws cheaply; fold to aggression without hits. Use for multi-way pots with deep stacks.

strength_description: Low equity (<50% vs. random); rainbow/low disconnected, weak pairs r, non-nut A-high r. Poor playability; avoid unless stealing blinds.
ranges: 55-22 r, 2g low rundowns r (e.g., 9864r), Other non-A r with gaps, weak ss like K543ss.
concrete_examples: 5♠5♥4♦3♣ (5543r - low set potential, no draws), K♦Q♣J♥9♠ (KQJ9r - broadway but no suits), A♠2♥3♦4♣ (A234r - wheel but rainbow).
play_narrative: Fold preflop from all positions unless in blinds vs. folds (steal attempt). Never 3-bet. Postflop: Only continue with monster flops (e.g., quads); high variance, minimal edges. Save chips for better spots.
